Forwarded From Commander of the Air Force Mykola Oleschuk?? X-59/X-69 MISCELLANEOUS and NINE "SHAHEDIV" SHOT DOWN ????????? On the night of July 29
Link: the enemy attacked with a guided air missile Kh-59/ X-69 from the airspace of the occupied Donetsk region and 10 attack UAVs of the "Shahed" type from Cape Chauda - Crimea. Anti-aircraft missile units and mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the air attack. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle
column5: the Kh-59/Kh-69 guided air missile and nine Shahed-131/136 UAVs were shot down. Air targets were destroyed in the Dnipropetrovsk Kherson and Kirovohrad regions. Thank you for the combat work! ?? Together - to victory!
